summary: A comprehensive test suite for aiohttp's HTTP parsing components, covering request and response parsing, header handling, payload processing, various transfer encodings, and compression formats (deflate, gzip, brotli). The tests exercise both C and pureâ€‘Python parsers, checking edge cases, error handling, and protocol compliance.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, robustness, and standards compliance of the HTTP parser used in the aiohttp library, preventing regressions and ensuring reliable handling of diverse HTTP messages in production applications.
